item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 10, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. I've acquired a new superpower (777 points | 329 comments)
2. Cuttle – a MTG like game using a standard 52 card deck (107 points | 34 comments)
3. Datadog acquires Quickwit (68 points | 24 comments)
4. Meta's memo to employees rolling back DEI programs (469 points | 532 comments)
5. Getting silly with C, part (void*)2 (89 points | 40 comments)
6. Formal Methods: Just Good Engineering Practice? (2024) (138 points | 81 comments)
7. Mercury's shadowy North Pole revealed by M-CAM 1 (31 points | 9 comments)
8. Flattening ASTs (and Other Compiler Data Structures) (29 points | 4 comments)
9. Doing Hard Things While Living Life: Why We Built Vade Studio in Clojure (80 points | 22 comments)
10. Learning How to Think with Meta Chain-of-Thought (154 points | 40 comments)
11. OpenAI's bot crushed this seven-person company's web site 'like a DDoS attack' (27 points | 24 comments)
12. Finland's zero homeless strategy (2021) (61 points | 128 comments)
13. I got OpenTelemetry to work. But why was it so complicated? (143 points | 104 comments)
14. Show HN: TubePen – My attempt to get more out of YouTube learning (15 points | 9 comments)
15. Stone selection by wild chimpanzees shares patterns with Oldowan hominins (20 points | 1 comment)
16. Visualizing All ISBNs (312 points | 95 comments)
17. The Tedious Heroism of David Ruggles (100 points | 12 comments)
18. Who Can Understand the Proof? A Window on Formalized Mathematics (159 points | 86 comments)
19. Creates hyper-realistic voice clones from just 3 seconds of audio (17 points | 14 comments)
20. Glimmer: DSL Framework for Ruby GUI and More (131 points | 21 comments)
21. Starlink is now cheaper than leading internet provider in some African countries (193 points | 145 comments)
22. Show HN: Tetris in a PDF (1106 points | 202 comments)
23. Wasmer (YC S19) Is Hiring a Rust Engineer in EU timezone (Remote) ( | hide)
24. Tactility: OS for the ESP32 Microcontroller Family (136 points | 39 comments)
25. Experiments with Byte Matrix Multiplication (23 points | 3 comments)
26. Before Squid Game, there was Battle Royale (143 points | 223 comments)
27. Visualizing Dimensional Relationships (7 points | discuss)
28. Parsing the C64 Bubble Bobble Wind Currents (129 points | 24 comments)
29. Why is hash(-1) == hash(-2) in Python? (74 points | 60 comments)
30. Bird-inspired drone uses legs to walk and jump into the air (178 points | 60 comments)
